nodes.text: Loy Kommas was a lightsaber-wielding Dark Jedi who served the Galactic Empire.
Cerca 1 ABY, Loy was stationed in the Imperial Detainment Facility in the Imperial Fortress on Yavin 4.
In this facility, the Empire imprisoned six Rebel pilots. During the Remembrance Day festivities of that year, Wedge Antilles employed a loyal Rebel to rescue the pilots.
The Rebel killed Loy so that one of the Rebel pilots could sneak out of the base in his robe. Kommas wielded a red lightsaber and was capable of using Force lightning.
